remarks: Deduce equality of relations from equivalence of membership. (Contributed by Rodolfo Medina, 10-Oct-2010.)
statement:
eqrelrdv.1 $e |- Rel A $.
eqrelrdv.2 $e |- Rel B $.
eqrelrdv.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( <. x , y >. e. A <-> <. x , y >. e. B ) ) $.
eqrelrdv $p |- ( ph -> A = B ) $.
$d A x y $.
$d B x y $.
$d ph x y $.
